title: Metrical Charm 12:Against a Wen
text:
Wenne, wenne,	wenchichenne,her ne scealt þu timbrien,	ne nenne tun habben,ac þu scealt north eonene	to þan nihgan berhge,þer þu hauest, ermig,	enne broþer.He þe sceal legge	leaf et heafde.Under fot wolues,	under ueþer earnes,under earnes clea,	a þu geweornie.Clinge þu	alswa col on heorþe,scring þu	alswa scerne awage,
and weorne	alswa weter on anbre.
Swa litel þu gewurþe	alswa linsetcorn,
and miccli lesse	alswa anes handwurmes hupeban,
and alswa litel þu gewurþe	þet þu nawiht gewurþe.
